name: Soul Orbit #1
description:
"O spirit who becomes king
in my body and in my blood
spin on the highest orbit
on your throne

As desired
by the Artist who made you
that silence and light
is where you dance"

-----------------------

This work is a 3D work that I designed in Blender, inspired by the dervish dance of the Maulawiyah Order, fronted by Maulana Jalaluddin Rumi, and inspired by the rotation of tawaf, rotation of the sun, moon, venus, dna, rna, and the bees. dedicated to the spirit of every human being.
